Title: User enumeration in authentication mechanisms
Description: The ability to enumerate users was possible without relevant permissions due to different exception messages depending on whether the user existed or not.
AffectedVersions: All versions before 2.10.7, all versions starting from 2.11.0 before 2.11.3
NotImpacted: All versions starting from 2.10.7 before 2.11.0, all versions starting from 2.11.3
